description:
11.177 noise
Add noise on video input frame.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: noise

parameters.description: Set noise seed for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case of all_seed. Default value is 123457.
parameters.name: all_seed

parameters.description: Set noise seed for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case of all_seed. Default value is 123457.
parameters.name: c0_seed

parameters.description: Set noise seed for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case of all_seed. Default value is 123457.
parameters.name: c1_seed

parameters.description: Set noise seed for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case of all_seed. Default value is 123457.
parameters.name: c2_seed

parameters.description: Set noise seed for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case of all_seed. Default value is 123457.
parameters.name: c3_seed

parameters.description: Set noise strength for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case all_strength. Default value is 0. Allowed range is [0, 100].
parameters.name: all_strength, alls

parameters.description: Set noise strength for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case all_strength. Default value is 0. Allowed range is [0, 100].
parameters.name: c0_strength, c0s

parameters.description: Set noise strength for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case all_strength. Default value is 0. Allowed range is [0, 100].
parameters.name: c1_strength, c1s

parameters.description: Set noise strength for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case all_strength. Default value is 0. Allowed range is [0, 100].
parameters.name: c2_strength, c2s

parameters.description: Set noise strength for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case all_strength. Default value is 0. Allowed range is [0, 100].
parameters.name: c3_strength, c3s

parameters.description:
Set pixel component flags or set flags for all components if all_flags. Available values for component flags are:

‘a’

averaged temporal noise (smoother)

‘p’

mix random noise with a (semi)regular pattern

‘t’

temporal noise (noise pattern changes between frames)

‘u’

uniform noise (gaussian otherwise)
parameters.name: all_flags, allf

parameters.description:
Set pixel component flags or set flags for all components if all_flags. Available values for component flags are:

‘a’

averaged temporal noise (smoother)

‘p’

mix random noise with a (semi)regular pattern

‘t’

temporal noise (noise pattern changes between frames)

‘u’

uniform noise (gaussian otherwise)
parameters.name: c0_flags, c0f

parameters.description:
Set pixel component flags or set flags for all components if all_flags. Available values for component flags are:

‘a’

averaged temporal noise (smoother)

‘p’

mix random noise with a (semi)regular pattern

‘t’

temporal noise (noise pattern changes between frames)

‘u’

uniform noise (gaussian otherwise)
parameters.name: c1_flags, c1f

parameters.description:
Set pixel component flags or set flags for all components if all_flags. Available values for component flags are:

‘a’

averaged temporal noise (smoother)

‘p’

mix random noise with a (semi)regular pattern

‘t’

temporal noise (noise pattern changes between frames)

‘u’

uniform noise (gaussian otherwise)
parameters.name: c2_flags, c2f

parameters.description:
Set pixel component flags or set flags for all components if all_flags. Available values for component flags are:

‘a’

averaged temporal noise (smoother)

‘p’

mix random noise with a (semi)regular pattern

‘t’

temporal noise (noise pattern changes between frames)

‘u’

uniform noise (gaussian otherwise)
parameters.name: c3_flags, c3f

11.177 noise

Add noise on video input frame.

The filter accepts the following options:

all_seed
c0_seed
c1_seed
c2_seed
c3_seed

Set noise seed for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case of all_seed. Default value is 123457.

all_strength, alls
c0_strength, c0s
c1_strength, c1s
c2_strength, c2s
c3_strength, c3s

Set noise strength for specific pixel component or all pixel components in case all_strength. Default value is 0. Allowed range is [0, 100].

all_flags, allf
c0_flags, c0f
c1_flags, c1f
c2_flags, c2f
c3_flags, c3f

Set pixel component flags or set flags for all components if all_flags. Available values for component flags are:

‘a’

averaged temporal noise (smoother)

‘p’

mix random noise with a (semi)regular pattern

‘t’

temporal noise (noise pattern changes between frames)

‘u’

uniform noise (gaussian otherwise)
